summary: Provides a unified abstraction for converting text into dense vector embeddings, defining an abstract base class that manages configuration, retry mechanisms, and asynchronous execution, and includes a factory to instantiate concrete adapters for various embedding providers such as Hugging Face, LangChain, and LlamaIndex.
business_intent: Facilitate flexible and reliable integration of multiple embedding services within RAG pipelines, allowing developers to switch providers easily while handling errors and asynchronous calls consistently.
